PHRASE.LANG: Sweetie Pie will melt your heart as your favorite new Peep! With sugar and spice, your Companion Peep will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best girl. [#Legal]
Sweetie Pie va faire fondre ton cœur comme ta nouvelle peep. Tout sucre, tout miel, ta Compagne Peep va te suivre partout et va être ta meilleure amie.[#Legal]
Sweetie Pie wird dein Herz als neues Lieblings-Peep erobern! Als zuckersüße Gefährtin wird dir dein Freundschafts-Peep zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist deine beste Freundin! [#Legal]
Sweetie Pie ti scioglierá il cuore come il tuo nuovo e preferito Peep! Con zucchero e spezie, il tuo Companion Peep ti seguirá in casa e diventerá la tua migliore amica.[#Legal]
Sweetie Pie te derretirá el corazón y será tu Peep favorito! Con azúcar y especias, tu Companion Peep te seguirá a tu casa y será tu mejor amiga.[#Legal]
Sweetie Pie는 사랑스런 새 Peep입니다! 설탕과 양념만 있으면 컴패니언 Peep은 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어 할 거에요. [#Legal]
Sweetie Pie will melt your heart as your favorite new Peep! With sugar and spice, your Companion Peep will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best girl. [#Legal]
Sweetie Pie會溶化您的心，成為您的Peep新寵！完美的隨身夥伴Peep會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的最佳女孩。 [#Legal]
Sweetie Pie會溶化您的心，成為您的 Peep新寵！完美的隨身夥伴Peep會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的最佳女孩。 [#Legal]
Sweetie Pie will melt your heart as your favorite new Peep! With sugar and spice, your Companion Peep will follow you throughout Home and will be your best girl.[#Legal]
